Package acme.exams.controller.professor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignMarkController
    Controller handling the interaction with the view used by a Professor for assigning marks to students
    MenuProfessorController
    Controller handling the interaction with the Professor main menu view
    ProfessorExamListController
    Controller handling the interaction with the view display the Professor's exam list
    RegisterProfessorController
    Controller handling the interaction with the view responsible of the registration of new professors.
